source:
%%sql
-- Build Employee_Dim table 

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact

SELECT DISTINCT
    T1.Pers_No as EmployeeID,
    to_date(T1.Birth_date) AS DOB,
    T1.NI_number as NINumber,
    T1.Pers_No as PersNumber,
    T2.Staff_Number as EmployeeNumber,
    T1.Employee_No as LegacyEmployeeNumber,
    NULL AS NewSAPEmployeeNumber,
    T4.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from) AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.Birth_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.NI_number, '.'), IFNULL(T1.Pers_No, '.'),IFNULL(T2.Staff_Number, '.'), IFNULL(T1.Employee_No,'.'))) AS RowID, 
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr_historic T1
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.vw_addresses T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.Staff_Number
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T4 ON "SAP HR" = T4.Description and T4.IsActive = 'Y'

%%sql

-- CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW employee_fact_from_leavers

--     AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    Pers_No,
    Employee_No

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_leavers
WHERE Pers_No NOT IN (SELECT EmployeeID FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact)

%%sql

SELECT * FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact ORDER BY employeeID
